prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Piano, Brass, Bass, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Organ, Piano, Brass, Bass, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Piano, Brass, Bass, and Drums, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Organ, Piano, Brass, Bass, and Drums, excluding the Guitar.
